entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a boy who is going to Hogwarts.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school for magic, where Harry will be attending.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Harry's cousin, who is mentioned as having similar behavior to the boy Harry meets.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: A house at Hogwarts that the boy claims his family has always been a part of.

entities.name: hufflepuff
entities.description: A house at Hogwarts that the boy thinks he would leave if he were in it.

relationships.description: Harry is going to attend Hogwarts, as mentioned by the boy.
The boy claims that his family has always been in Slytherin house at Hogwarts.
